name: Operation Alexandra
overview:
At present, Land of Alexandra is a territory officially recognized as part of the Russian Federation, but this was not always the case. In the mid-1970s, the Soviet Union occupied the archipelago of Tierra de Francisco José as a measure of pressure in the face of the international dispute over those territories and sent 2 important contingents to the most relevant islands: Tierra de Jorge and Tierra de Alexandra.

We play the protagonist of this story, Mihail Mashkov , an officer of the Russian army who is a member of this mission.

During one of our regular patrols by Land of Alexandra, the base informs us of some strange radio signals near our position, and asks us for visual confirmation that everything is in order there.

Upon reaching our goal, we discover that those mysterious radio signals come from a former abandoned Nazi base . An unexpected snowstorm complicates our return to the base and makes all radio communication impossible, so we choose to take refuge in the mysterious building and wait for the storm to subside.

It didn't take long for us to realize that we are not alone ...
